selection_reasoning: The selection prioritizes the current numerical peak (8_0) and the most robust search strategy (7_5). It also includes 13_0 for its clean Jacobian implementation and 13_4 to maintain topological diversity between FCC and HCP-like configurations. The goal for the next generation is to combine the robust search of 7_5 with the extreme precision and analytical gradients of 8_0/13_0.

trial_selections.reasoning: Current all-time best score (1.0000159135539168). It successfully utilized analytical Jacobians and a 1e-16 ftol to reach the machine precision limit of the Rhombic Dodecahedron basin.
Extremely robust search logic. While its precision was lower (1e-8 ftol), its basin-hopping implementation is the most reliable for finding the global optimum basin.
Provides a very clean and modernized implementation of the analytical Jacobian framework for 182 constraints, serving as an excellent template for further refinement.
Represents a distinct geometric isomer (HCP/Hexagonal family). It is essential to carry this forward to ensure the evolution doesn't prematurely converge on a single topological basin.
